pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross Tabulation and Loglinear Analyses of Categorical Data // Provides 'SPSS'- and 'SAS'-like output for cross tabulations of two categorical variables (CROSSTABS) and for hierarchical loglinear analyses of two or more categorical variables (LOGLINEAR). The methods are described in Agresti (2013, ISBN:978-0-470-46363-5), Ajzen Walker (2021, ISBN:9780429330308), Field (2018, ISBN:9781526440273), Norusis (2012, ISBN:978-0-321-74843-0), Nussbaum (2015, ISBN:978-1-84872-603-1), Stevens (2009, ISBN:978-0-8058-5903-4), Tabachnik Fidell (2019, ISBN:9780134790541), and von Eye Mun (2013, ISBN:978-1-118-14640-8).
